shortdesc.ph: Gets the current playback progress (ms) of the audio mixing.
Gets the current playback position of the audio mixing (milliseconds).

ul.li: You need to call this method after calling startAudioMixing and receiving the (AUDIO_MIXING_STATE_PLAYING) callback.
If you need to call multiple times, ensure the interval between two calls is greater than 500 ms.
You need to call this method after calling startAudioMixing and receiving the (AUDIO_MIXING_STATE_PLAYING) callback.
If you need to call multiple times, ensure the interval between calls is greater than 500 milliseconds.
â‰¥ 0: Success. Returns the current playback progress (ms) of the audio mixing. A return value of 0 indicates the music file has not started playing yet.
On success, returns the current playback position of the audio mixing (milliseconds). 0 means the music file has not started playing.
